workHistory.heading: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
descriptions: This role allowed me to gain hands-on experience in cloud and network security while collaborating with cross-functional engineering teams to resolve complex account-related issues.
By leveraging my expertise in AWS services, I ensured account security and contributed to resolving customer support escalations effectively.

My comprehensive understanding of AWS products and services enabled me to guide customers in adopting tailored solutions while maintaining a balance between technical problem-solving and clear communication.

workHistory.heading: Freelance Web Developer
descriptions: As a Web Developer and Designer, I focus on creating and managing responsive websites using technologies such as React, Node.js, and MongoDB. My work includes developing user-friendly interfaces, ensuring functionality, and delivering scalable solutions tailored to client needs.

I have designed and deployed websites for various industries, translating client requirements into effective designs while optimizing performance and cross-device compatibility. My experience includes API integration, implementing security measures, and deploying projects on AWS for reliable hosting and scalability
